name: Commander Charlie: Trouble in Deep Space
name_original: Commander Charlie: Trouble in Deep Space
description:
----------------------------------------------------

  The year is 3040. The Cat Empire's military expansion has overtaken all known galaxy, enslaving humans and dogs alike. In the edge of charted space, carrying crucial intel, we find our unlikely hero: Commander Charlie, a rebel leader with a criminal past, questionable methods and a history for rage-filled rampages, is caught by Queen Nina's patrol. Will his guile be enough to outsmart the empire's most ruthless and cold-blooded fish-eaters and make it to deep space? Will his lust for revenge drive him to foolish violence, when so much is at stake? As just another of the universe's cruel tests, our hopes lie in Commander Charlie.

Controls

----------------------------------------------------

Left mouse/Spacebar - Shoot

W - thrust forward

A, D - rotate left/right

B - boost

You pilot a state of the art energy-efficient P3D-GR3 ship, designed to work in deep-space independently of the presence of solar power, and as such the energy generated by your systems are used to power up another part of the ship:

  • Fast movement recharges your shield and your rotation aligns it.
  • Absorving shots with your shield powers up your weapon, temporarily.
  • Murder recharges your boost - a personal modification added by Charlie's request.

TIP: Use your shield and boost agressively if you wish to survive.
